message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a product that I believe you'll find incredibly valuable. Given its unique benefits, I'm proposing a starting price of $1,350,000. This is a fantastic opportunity to acquire something truly special.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product you're offering. However, I am looking to keep my investment within a certain budget. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1,200,000 for the product.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer and understand your desire to work within a budget.  Considering the true value of this product, I believe a price closer to my initial offer is more than fair. I'm willing to come down slightly to $1,275,000. This is my final offer.

I've considered your latest offer, Alice. While I understand the value of the product, I still aim to keep my expenses within my set limit. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1,250,000 for the product.
